column4: Jill Valentine must escape Racoon city amid the nightmarish T-Virus outbreak
column5: all while being persued by the relentless bio-weapon Nemesis.

column4: Three years after the events at Beacon Mental Hospital
column5: Sebastian Castellanos has left the Krimson City Police Department
column6: but the mysterious organization MOBIUS gives him a chance to save his own thought-dead daughter.

column4: Investigative Journalists Blake and his wife Lynn
column5: travel to the Arizona Desert to pursue a lead on a popular suicide
column6: but are soon ambushed by a mysterious and terrifying cult.
